1. Level 1 uses list-style decimal
   1. Level 2 { template: "\<number\>)", list_style_type: "decimal" }
   2. Level 2
      1. Level 3 { list_style_type: "lower-latin" }
      2. Level 3
      3. Level 3
      4. Level 3
         1. Level 4 { template: "(\<number\>)", list_style_type: "lower-roman", spanning: true }
         2. Level 4
